RequestInformation.Name: PackageName
RequestInformation.Label: Package Name
RequestInformation.Description: The name of the package that was used to make the request.

RequestInformation.Name: SearchTerm
RequestInformation.Label: Search Term
RequestInformation.Description: The value used to do the look up.

RequestInformation.Name: SearchType
RequestInformation.Label: Search Type
RequestInformation.Description: Which data item that is being looked up.

RequestInformation.Name: RequestIp
RequestInformation.Label: Request IP Address
RequestInformation.Description: The IP address where the request was made from.

ResponseInformation.Name: StatusMessage
ResponseInformation.Label: Status Code Text
ResponseInformation.Description: The status of the response as text

ResponseInformation.Name: IsSuccessStatusCode
ResponseInformation.Label: Is Status Code Successful
ResponseInformation.Description: This returns whether the status of the response indicates that the request was successful.

ResponseInformation.Name: QueryTimeMs
ResponseInformation.Label: Query Time
ResponseInformation.Description: This is the amount of time the query took to execute in milliseconds

ResponseInformation.Name: ResponseId
ResponseInformation.Label: Response Identifier
ResponseInformation.Description: This is the unique identifier of the report. Use this when referring to any issues with the results with support.

BillingInformation.Name: BillingTransactionId
BillingInformation.Label: Billing Transaction Id
BillingInformation.Description: This is the unique reference to the billing transaction for this lookup. If missing this transaction did not require any billing to take place.

BillingInformation.Name: AccountType
BillingInformation.Label: Account Type
BillingInformation.Description: This is the current type of account that defines how the account is billed.

BillingInformation.Name: AccountBalance
BillingInformation.Label: Account Balance
BillingInformation.Description: The current balance of the account if this is a pay as a go account.

BillingInformation.Name: TransactionCost
BillingInformation.Label: Transaction Cost
BillingInformation.Description: The total cost of the transaction if the transaction required billing.

BillingInformation.Name: BillingResultMessage
BillingInformation.Label: Billing Result Text
BillingInformation.Description: Whether the account was billed in text format

BillingInformation.Name: RefundAmount
BillingInformation.Label: Refund Amount
BillingInformation.Description: The amount that was required to be refunded depending on what package data was able to be returned and how the package was set up.

BillingInformation.Name: RefundResult
BillingInformation.Label: Refund Result
BillingInformation.Description: Whether the transaction had a refund

BillingInformation.Name: RefundResultMessage
BillingInformation.Label: Refund Result Text
BillingInformation.Description: Whether the transaction had a refund in text format

VehicleCodes.Name: Uvc
VehicleCodes.Label: UVC
VehicleCodes.Description: Universal Vehicle Code. UK Vehicle Data internal vehicle model code. Code is unique to each vehicle model.

ObjectProperties.Name: Vrm
ObjectProperties.Label: VRM
ObjectProperties.Description: The Vehicle Registration Mark (VRM).

ObjectProperties.Name: Vin
ObjectProperties.Label: VIN
ObjectProperties.Description: The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) - sometimes referred to as the Chassis Number.

ObjectProperties.Name: VinLast5
ObjectProperties.Label: VIN Last 5
ObjectProperties.Description: The last 5 digits of the Vehicle Identification Number (VIN).

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaMake
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA Make
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle make (eg: Ford, Volkswagen, Audi)

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaModel
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA Model
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle model (eg: Galaxy, Sharan, R8)

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaWheelPlan
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA Wheel Plan
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle wheel plan identifier (eg: 2 AXLE RIGID BODY)

ObjectProperties.Name: DateFirstRegisteredInUk
ObjectProperties.Label: Date First Registered in UK
ObjectProperties.Description: Date/time the vehicle was first registered in the UK.

ObjectProperties.Name: DateFirstRegistered
ObjectProperties.Label: Date First Registered
ObjectProperties.Description: Date/time the vehicle was first registered.

ObjectProperties.Name: DateOfManufacture
ObjectProperties.Label: Date Of Manufacture
ObjectProperties.Description: Date/time the vehicle was manufactured.

ObjectProperties.Name: YearOfManufacture
ObjectProperties.Label: Year Of Manufacture
ObjectProperties.Description: Year the vehicle was manufactured.

ObjectProperties.Name: VehicleUsedBeforeFirstRegistration
ObjectProperties.Label: Vehicle Used Before First Registration
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the vehicle used before first registration.

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineNumber
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Number
ObjectProperties.Description: The vehicle's Engine Number.

ObjectProperties.Name: PreviousVrmNi
ObjectProperties.Label: Previous VRM NI
ObjectProperties.Description: The vehicle's Northern Ireland plate - if the vehicle previously had a Northern Ireland VRM.

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaBodyType
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA Body Type
ObjectProperties.Description: The DVLA Body Type.

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaFuelType
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA Fuel Type
ObjectProperties.Description: The DVLA Fuel Type.

VehicleDetails.Name: VehicleStatus
VehicleDetails.Label: Vehicle Status
VehicleDetails.Description: Vehicle status details (such as import, export and scrapped status).

ObjectProperties.Name: IsImported
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Imported
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not vehicle was imported from within the EU (European Union).

ObjectProperties.Name: IsImportedFromNi
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Imported From NI
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not vehicle was imported from Northern Ireland.

ObjectProperties.Name: IsImportedFromOutsideEu
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Imported From Non EU
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not vehicle was imported from outside the EU (European Union).

ObjectProperties.Name: DateImported
ObjectProperties.Label: Date Imported
ObjectProperties.Description: Date/time the vehicle was imported.

ObjectProperties.Name: CertificateOfDestructionIssued
ObjectProperties.Label: Certificate of Destruction Issued
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not a Certificate of Destruction been issued for this vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: IsExported
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Exported
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the vehicle is recorded as having been exported.

ObjectProperties.Name: DateExported
ObjectProperties.Label: Date Exported
ObjectProperties.Description: Date and time the vehicle was exported.

ObjectProperties.Name: IsScrapped
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Scrapped
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the vehicle been recorded as scrapped.

ObjectProperties.Name: IsUnscrapped
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Unscrapped
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the vehicle has been recorded as un-scrapped.

ObjectProperties.Name: DateScrapped
ObjectProperties.Label: Date Scrapped
ObjectProperties.Description: Date and time the vehicle was recorded as scrapped.

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaCherishedTransferMarker
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA Cherished Transfer Marker
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the vehicle has been subject to cherished transfers, as disclosed by the DVLA

ObjectProperties.Name: VehicleExciseDutyDetails
ObjectProperties.Label: Vehicle Excise Duty Details
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle Excise Duty Details (Tax & CO2 ratings & values).

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaCo2
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA CO2
ObjectProperties.Description: The CO2 value, unchecked direct from the DVLA.

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaCo2Band
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA CO2 Band
ObjectProperties.Description: The CO2 band, unchecked direct from the DVLA.

ObjectProperties.Name: DvlaBand
ObjectProperties.Label: DVLA Band
ObjectProperties.Description: DVLA band details.

ObjectProperties.Name: VedRate
ObjectProperties.Label: Ved Rate
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge details. Object contains information regarding the First Year, Premium Vehicle and Standard vehicle road taxes.

ObjectProperties.Name: FirstYear
ObjectProperties.Label: First Year
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for the first year. Object contains 6 & 12 month values.

ObjectProperties.Name: SixMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Six Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 6 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: TwelveMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Twelve Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 12 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: PremiumVehicle
ObjectProperties.Label: Premium Vehicle
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle Road Tax charge for Premium rated vehicles OTR above Â£40,000. Object contains 6 & 12 month values.

ObjectProperties.Name: SixMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Six Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 6 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: TwelveMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Twelve Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 12 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: Standard
ObjectProperties.Label: Standard
ObjectProperties.Description: Standard vehicle road tax. Object contains 6 & 12 month values.

ObjectProperties.Name: SixMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Six Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 6 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: TwelveMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Twelve Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 12 months.

VehicleDetails.Name: VehicleHistory
VehicleDetails.Label: Vehicle History
VehicleDetails.Description: Vehicle status details (such as import, export and scrapped status).

ObjectProperties.Name: ColourDetails
ObjectProperties.Label: Colour Details
ObjectProperties.Description: Current & Previous vehicle colour details.

ObjectProperties.Name: CurrentColour
ObjectProperties.Label: Current Colour
ObjectProperties.Description: The vehicle's currently recorded colour.

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfColourChanges
ObjectProperties.Label: Number Of Colour Changes
ObjectProperties.Description: Number of colour changes recorded for this vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: OriginalColour
ObjectProperties.Label: Original Colour
ObjectProperties.Description: The vehicle's original colour.

ObjectProperties.Name: PreviousColour
ObjectProperties.Label: Previous Colour
ObjectProperties.Description: The vehicle's previous colour.

ObjectProperties.Name: LatestColourChangeDate
ObjectProperties.Label: Latest Colour Change Date
ObjectProperties.Description: The latest date when the vehicle's colour was recorded as having been changed.

ObjectProperties.Name: KeeperChangeList
ObjectProperties.Label: Keeper Change List
ObjectProperties.Description: List of Keeper changes.

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfPreviousKeepers
ObjectProperties.Label: Number Of Previous Keepers
ObjectProperties.Description: The number of previous keepers for this vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: KeeperStartDate
ObjectProperties.Label: Keeper Start Date
ObjectProperties.Description: Date when the current keeper started.

ObjectProperties.Name: PreviousKeeperDisposalDate
ObjectProperties.Label: Previous Keeper Disposal Date
ObjectProperties.Description: Date when the previous keeper disposed of the vehicle

ObjectProperties.Name: PlateChangeList
ObjectProperties.Label: Plate Change List
ObjectProperties.Description: List of registration plate changes.

ObjectProperties.Name: CurrentVrm
ObjectProperties.Label: Current VRM
ObjectProperties.Description: The vehicle's current VRM.

ObjectProperties.Name: TransferType
ObjectProperties.Label: Transfer Type
ObjectProperties.Description: The type of plate transfer.

ObjectProperties.Name: DateOfReceipt
ObjectProperties.Label: Receipt
ObjectProperties.Description: Date of receipt for the plate transfer.

ObjectProperties.Name: PreviousVrm
ObjectProperties.Label: Previous VRM
ObjectProperties.Description: The previous VRM, before the new (current VRM) was assigned.

ObjectProperties.Name: DateOfTransaction
ObjectProperties.Label: Date Of Transaction
ObjectProperties.Description: Date of the plate transfer transaction.

ObjectProperties.Name: V5cCertificateList
ObjectProperties.Label: V5C Certificate Issue Date List
ObjectProperties.Description: A list of V5C Certificate issued dates.

ObjectProperties.Name: IssueDate
ObjectProperties.Label: Issue Date
ObjectProperties.Description: Issue date of certificate.

VehicleDetails.Name: DvlaTechnicalDetails
VehicleDetails.Label: DVLA Technical Details
VehicleDetails.Description: Additional technical details held by the DVLA on this vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfSeats
ObjectProperties.Label: Number Of Seats
ObjectProperties.Description: Number of seats inside the vehicle, including the drivers seat

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineCapacityCc
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Capacity
ObjectProperties.Description: Engine Capacity as disclosed by the DVLA

ObjectProperties.Name: GrossWeightKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Gross Weight
ObjectProperties.Description: Gross Vehicle Weight, as disclosed by the DVLA

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxNetPowerKw
ObjectProperties.Label: Max Net Power
ObjectProperties.Description: Maximum Net Power of the vehicle, expressed in kW, as disclosed by the DVLA

ObjectProperties.Name: MassInServiceKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Mass In Service
ObjectProperties.Description: Mass In Service, as disclosed by the DVLA

ObjectProperties.Name: PowerToWeightRatio
ObjectProperties.Label: Power To Weight Ratio
ObjectProperties.Description: Power to Weight Ratio, as disclosed by the DVLA

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxPermissibleBrakedTrailerMassKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Max Permissible Braked Trailer Mass
ObjectProperties.Description: Maximum technically permissible mass of a braked trailer.

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxPermissibleUnbrakedTrailerMassKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Max Permissible Unbraked Trailer Mass
ObjectProperties.Description: Maximum technically permissible mass of an unbraked trailer.

VehicleDetails.Name: StatusMessage
VehicleDetails.Label: Status Message
VehicleDetails.Description: API Response Status Message. Human description describing the API response.

ObjectProperties.Name: Make
ObjectProperties.Label: Make
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle make (eg: Ford, Volkswagen, Audi).

ObjectProperties.Name: Range
ObjectProperties.Label: Range
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle range (eg: C-Max, Focus).

ObjectProperties.Name: Model
ObjectProperties.Label: Model
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle model (eg: C-Max Style TDCi, Focus LX).

ObjectProperties.Name: ModelVariant
ObjectProperties.Label: Model Variant
ObjectProperties.Description: This is the model variant,  Will be null if we have no variants

ObjectProperties.Name: Series
ObjectProperties.Label: Series
ObjectProperties.Description: The model series assigned by the manufacturer (eg: C214, E46).

ObjectProperties.Name: Mark
ObjectProperties.Label: Mark
ObjectProperties.Description: eg: VW Golf Mark 2 where a manufacturer uses it, if they do not, it will always be 1.

ObjectProperties.Name: StartDate
ObjectProperties.Label: Start Date
ObjectProperties.Description: Manufacturer's start date for this vehicle Make, Model, Series.

ObjectProperties.Name: EndDate
ObjectProperties.Label: End Date
ObjectProperties.Description: Manufacturer's end date for this vehicle Make, Model, Series.

ObjectProperties.Name: CountryOfOrigin
ObjectProperties.Label: Country of Origin
ObjectProperties.Description: Country where the vehicle was manufactured.

ObjectProperties.Name: VariantCode
ObjectProperties.Label: Variant Code
ObjectProperties.Description: Code number identifying the vehicle variant (model variation). Will be null if we have no variants.

ObjectProperties.Name: TypeApprovalCategory
ObjectProperties.Label: Type Approval Category
ObjectProperties.Description: The type approval category code assigned to this type of vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: MarketSectorCode
ObjectProperties.Label: Market Sector Code
ObjectProperties.Description: The market sector code assigned to this type of vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: VehicleClass
ObjectProperties.Label: Vehicle Class
ObjectProperties.Description: The class of vehicle (eg: Car).

ObjectProperties.Name: TaxationClass
ObjectProperties.Label: Taxation Class
ObjectProperties.Description: Taxation class is determined from type approval category, possible results are Car, PVC, LCV, HCV or Quad.

ObjectProperties.Name: VehicleWarrantyInformation
ObjectProperties.Label: Vehicle Warranty Information
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing Vehicle Warranty Information.

ObjectProperties.Name: ManufacturerWarrantyMiles
ObjectProperties.Label: Manufacturer Warranty Miles
ObjectProperties.Description: Manufacturer warranty from new, in miles (ie: 30,000 miles warranty).

ObjectProperties.Name: ManufacturerWarrantyMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Manufacturer Warranty Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Manufacturer warranty from new, in months (ie: 60 months warranty).

ObjectProperties.Name: SubscriptionOptionList
ObjectProperties.Label: Subscription Options
ObjectProperties.Description: List containing Subscription Options available for this vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: Name
ObjectProperties.Label: Subscription Name
ObjectProperties.Description: Name of the subscription service

ObjectProperties.Name: Software
ObjectProperties.Label: Software
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing vehicle software details.

ObjectProperties.Name: SupportsOverTheAirSoftwareUpdate
ObjectProperties.Label: Supports Over The Air Software Update
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the vehicle supports over the air software updates.

ObjectProperties.Name: BodyShape
ObjectProperties.Label: Body Shape
ObjectProperties.Description: Applicable to commercial vehicles to confirm the body shape.

ObjectProperties.Name: BodyStyle
ObjectProperties.Label: Body Style
ObjectProperties.Description: The body shape of this vehicle (eg: Saloon, Hatchback, MPV).

ObjectProperties.Name: CabType
ObjectProperties.Label: Cab Type
ObjectProperties.Description: Applicable to commercial vehicles (eg: Luton Van).

ObjectProperties.Name: PlatformName
ObjectProperties.Label: Platform Name
ObjectProperties.Description: The name of the platform the vehicle is based on.

ObjectProperties.Name: PlatformIsSharedAcrossModels
ObjectProperties.Label: Platform Is Shared Across Models
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the platform is shared across multiple models.

ObjectProperties.Name: WheelbaseType
ObjectProperties.Label: Wheelbase Type
ObjectProperties.Description: The wheelbase type for this vehicle (eg: Short Wheelbase, Long Wheelbase).

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfAxles
ObjectProperties.Label: Number Of Axles
ObjectProperties.Description: The number of axles on this vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfDoors
ObjectProperties.Label: Number Of Doors
ObjectProperties.Description: The number of doors on this vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfSeats
ObjectProperties.Label: Number Of Seats
ObjectProperties.Description: Number of seats for this vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: PayloadVolumeLitres
ObjectProperties.Label: Payload Volume
ObjectProperties.Description: The volume of the load area.

ObjectProperties.Name: FuelTankCapacityLitres
ObjectProperties.Label: Fuel Tank Capacity
ObjectProperties.Description: Fuel tank capacity expressed in litres.

ObjectProperties.Name: HeightMm
ObjectProperties.Label: Height
ObjectProperties.Description: Overall height of the vehicle, including roof-bars or aerial.

ObjectProperties.Name: LengthMm
ObjectProperties.Label: Length
ObjectProperties.Description: Overall length of the vehicle (bumper to bumper). Does not include any after market items, which may extended the length of the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: WidthMm
ObjectProperties.Label: Width
ObjectProperties.Description: Overall width, including the wing mirrors.

ObjectProperties.Name: WheelbaseLengthMm
ObjectProperties.Label: Wheelbase Length
ObjectProperties.Description: Wheelbase length of the vehicle expressed in mm.

ObjectProperties.Name: InternalLoadLengthMm
ObjectProperties.Label: Internal Load Length
ObjectProperties.Description: Applies to commercial vehicle. Length from the bulkhead to the rear of the load area expressed in mm.

ObjectProperties.Name: KerbWeightKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Kerb Weight
ObjectProperties.Description: The weight of the vehicle, including a full tank of fuel and all standard equipment.

ObjectProperties.Name: GrossTrainWeightKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Gross Train Weight
ObjectProperties.Description: The maximum permissible weight the vehicle, including any trailer.

ObjectProperties.Name: UnladenWeightKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Unladen Weight
ObjectProperties.Description: The weight of the vehicle, including all standard equipment.

ObjectProperties.Name: PayloadWeightKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Payload Weight
ObjectProperties.Description: The difference between the Kerb Weight and the Gross Weight.

ObjectProperties.Name: GrossVehicleWeightKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Gross Vehicle Weight
ObjectProperties.Description: The total weight of the vehicle including the Kerb Weight and Payload Weight.

ObjectProperties.Name: GrossCombinedWeightKg
ObjectProperties.Label: Gross Combined Weight
ObjectProperties.Description: The total combined weight: Fully laden vehicle and fully laden trailer added together.

ModelDetails.Name: Powertrain
ModelDetails.Label: Power Train
ModelDetails.Description: Object containing vehicle power source data.

ObjectProperties.Name: PowertrainType
ObjectProperties.Label: Powertrain Type
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle powertrain type (eg; ICE, REEV, BEV, PHEV).

ObjectProperties.Name: FuelType
ObjectProperties.Label: Fuel Type
ObjectProperties.Description: Fuel type for this vehicle (eg: DIESEL, PETROL).

ObjectProperties.Name: IceDetails
ObjectProperties.Label: ICE Details
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing Internal Combustion Engine details Data.

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineFamily
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Family
ObjectProperties.Description: A family is a basic unit used to identify a family/group of engines for certification and compliance purposes.

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineLocation
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Location
ObjectProperties.Description: The relative location of the engine within the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineDescription
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Description
ObjectProperties.Description: Describes the type of engine.

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineManufacturer
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Manufacturer
ObjectProperties.Description: The manufacturer of the engine.

ObjectProperties.Name: FuelDelivery
ObjectProperties.Label: Fuel Delivery
ObjectProperties.Description: The fuel delivery mechanism used in the engine (eg: Injection).

ObjectProperties.Name: Aspiration
ObjectProperties.Label: Aspiration
ObjectProperties.Description: The type of aspiration mechanism used in the engine (eg: Turbo charged, naturally aspirated).

ObjectProperties.Name: CylinderArrangement
ObjectProperties.Label: Cylinder Arrangement
ObjectProperties.Description: The arrangement of the cylinders within the engine (eg: Inline, Vee, W, Rotary).

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfCylinders
ObjectProperties.Label: Number of Cylinders
ObjectProperties.Description: The number of cylinders within the engine.

ObjectProperties.Name: BoreMm
ObjectProperties.Label: Bore
ObjectProperties.Description: Diameter of cylinder.

ObjectProperties.Name: StrokeMm
ObjectProperties.Label: Stroke
ObjectProperties.Description: Length of the swept volume of the cylinder expressed in mm.  This is the distance the piston travels between top and bottom dead centre of the stroke.

ObjectProperties.Name: ValveGear
ObjectProperties.Label: Valve Gear
ObjectProperties.Description: Describes the valve actuation mechanism used in the engine (eg: DOHC, OHC).

ObjectProperties.Name: ValvesPerCylinder
ObjectProperties.Label: Valves per Cylinder
ObjectProperties.Description: The number of valves per cylinder.

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineCapacityCc
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Capacity
ObjectProperties.Description: The cubic capacity of the engine.

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineCapacityLitres
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Capacity
ObjectProperties.Description: The cubic capacity in litres of the engine rounded up or down. Based on the Engine Capacity CC.

ObjectProperties.Name: EvDetails
ObjectProperties.Label: EV Details
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing Electric Vehicle details Data.

ObjectProperties.Name: TechnicalDetails
ObjectProperties.Label: Technical Details
ObjectProperties.Description: An object containing technical details for the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: PowertrainType
ObjectProperties.Label: Powertrain Type
ObjectProperties.Description: Powertrain types (eg: ICE, REEV, BEV, PHEV).

ObjectProperties.Name: IsTeslaSuperchargerCompatible
ObjectProperties.Label: Tesla Supercharger Compatible
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the hardware is compatible with Tesla Superchargers.

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfChargePorts
ObjectProperties.Label: Number Of Charge Ports
ObjectProperties.Description: Number of charge ports available on the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: TeslaSupercharging
ObjectProperties.Label: Tesla Supercharging
ObjectProperties.Description: Object describing Tesla Supercharging details.

ObjectProperties.Name: Version1
ObjectProperties.Label: Version 1
ObjectProperties.Description: Object describing Tesla Supercharger Version 1.

ObjectProperties.Description: This supercharging version is compatible with the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxChargeKw

ObjectProperties.Description: The maximum charge in Kilowatts for this supercharger version

ObjectProperties.Name: RequiresCcsAdaptor

ObjectProperties.Name: AverageChargeTime10To80Percent
ObjectProperties.Label: Avg Charge Time 10-80%
ObjectProperties.Description: The average time taken using this supercharger version from 10% to 80%

ObjectProperties.Label: Is Compatible With Vehicle
ObjectProperties.Description: This supercharging version is compatible with the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Description: The maximum charge in Kilowatts for this supercharger version

ObjectProperties.Name: RequiresCcsAdaptor
ObjectProperties.Label: Requires Ccs Adaptor
ObjectProperties.Description: CCS (Combined Charging System) Does this supercharger version require a CCS Adaptor?

ObjectProperties.Name: AverageChargeTime10To80Percent
ObjectProperties.Label: Avg Charge Time 10-80%
ObjectProperties.Description: The average time taken using this supercharger version from 10% to 80%

ObjectProperties.Label: Version 3

ObjectProperties.Name: IsCompatibleWithVehicle
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Compatible With Vehicle
ObjectProperties.Description: This supercharging version is compatible with the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxChargeKw

ObjectProperties.Description: The maximum charge in Kilowatts for this supercharger version

ObjectProperties.Name: RequiresCcsAdaptor
ObjectProperties.Label: Requires Ccs Adaptor
ObjectProperties.Description: CCS (Combined Charging System) Does this supercharger version require a CCS Adaptor?

ObjectProperties.Name: AverageChargeTime10To80Percent
ObjectProperties.Label: Avg Charge Time 10-80%
ObjectProperties.Description: The average time taken using this supercharger version from 10% to 80%

ObjectProperties.Name: ChargeCableDetailsList
ObjectProperties.Label: Charge Cable Details
ObjectProperties.Description: List of charge cable details for the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: IsSuppliedAsStandard
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Supplied As Standard
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not this charge cable is supplied as standard (rather than being an optional extra).

ObjectProperties.Name: Description
ObjectProperties.Label: Description
ObjectProperties.Description: Charge cable description.

ObjectProperties.Name: ChargePortDetailsList
ObjectProperties.Label: Charge Port Details List
ObjectProperties.Description: List containing Charge Port details.

ObjectProperties.Name: PortType
ObjectProperties.Label: Port Type
ObjectProperties.Description: The type of port for this charge port item.

ObjectProperties.Name: LocationOnVehicle
ObjectProperties.Label: Location On Vehicle
ObjectProperties.Description: The location of this charge port on vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxChargePowerKw
ObjectProperties.Label: Max Charge Power
ObjectProperties.Description: The maximum capacity of the onboard charger for this charge port item.

ObjectProperties.Name: IsStandardChargePort
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Standard Charge Port
ObjectProperties.Description: Is this a standard charge port?

ObjectProperties.Name: ChargeTimes
ObjectProperties.Label: Charge Times
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing details for charge times.

ObjectProperties.Name: AverageChargeTimes10To80Percent
ObjectProperties.Label: Avg Charge Time 10-80%
ObjectProperties.Description: List containing details for average charge times

ObjectProperties.Name: ChargePortKw
ObjectProperties.Label: Charge Port Kw
ObjectProperties.Description: The rate of power delivery.

ObjectProperties.Name: TimeInMinutes
ObjectProperties.Label: Time In Minutes
ObjectProperties.Description: The time in minutes to go from 10% to 80%.

ObjectProperties.Name: BatteryDetailsList
ObjectProperties.Label: Battery Details List
ObjectProperties.Description: List containing Battery details.

ObjectProperties.Name: TotalCapacityKwh
ObjectProperties.Label: Total Capacity
ObjectProperties.Description: The total (design maximum) capacity of the battery in Kilowatts/per hour.

ObjectProperties.Name: UsableCapacityKwh
ObjectProperties.Label: Usable Capacity
ObjectProperties.Description: The usable capacity of the battery in Kilowatts/per hour.

ObjectProperties.Name: Description
ObjectProperties.Label: Description
ObjectProperties.Description: Description of the battery.

ObjectProperties.Name: Chemistry
ObjectProperties.Label: Chemistry
ObjectProperties.Description: Battery chemistry type (eg: Lithium-ion).

ObjectProperties.Name: Voltage
ObjectProperties.Label: Voltage
ObjectProperties.Description: The voltage of the battery.

ObjectProperties.Name: LocationOnVehicle
ObjectProperties.Label: Location On Vehicle
ObjectProperties.Description: Battery location on the vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: ManufacturerWarrantyMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Manufacturer Warranty Months
ObjectProperties.Description: The number of months (from new) where the battery is covered under a manufacturers warranty.

ObjectProperties.Name: ManufacturerWarrantyMiles
ObjectProperties.Label: Manufacturer Warranty Miles
ObjectProperties.Description: The number of miles (from new) where the battery is covered under a manufacturers warranty.

ObjectProperties.Name: MotorDetailsList
ObjectProperties.Label: Motor Details List
ObjectProperties.Description: List containing Motor details.

ObjectProperties.Name: Manufacturer
ObjectProperties.Label: Manufacturer
ObjectProperties.Description: The manufacturer of the motor.

ObjectProperties.Name: Model
ObjectProperties.Label: Model
ObjectProperties.Description: The model of the motor.

ObjectProperties.Name: MotorType
ObjectProperties.Label: Motor Type
ObjectProperties.Description: Type of motor (eg: AC induction/asynchronous).

ObjectProperties.Name: PowerKw
ObjectProperties.Label: Power Kw
ObjectProperties.Description: Total power in killowatts

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxPowerRpm
ObjectProperties.Label: Max Power Rpm
ObjectProperties.Description: The maximum power described in RPM (Revolutions Per Minute).

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxTorqueNm
ObjectProperties.Label: Max Torque Nm
ObjectProperties.Description: The maximum power described in Torque Nm (Torque Newton Metres).

ObjectProperties.Name: SupportsRegenerativeBraking
ObjectProperties.Label: Supports Regenerative Braking
ObjectProperties.Description: Supports recovery of kinetic energy to the battery whilst the vehicle is braking.

ObjectProperties.Name: MotorLocation
ObjectProperties.Label: Motor Location
ObjectProperties.Description: The location of the motor.

ObjectProperties.Name: AxleDrivenByMotor
ObjectProperties.Label: Axle Driven By Motor

ObjectProperties.Name: AdditionalInformation

ObjectProperties.Name: ZeroEmissionMiles

ObjectProperties.Name: DocumentVersion

ObjectProperties.Name: Transmission
ObjectProperties.Label: Transmission
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing vehicle transmission data.

ObjectProperties.Name: TransmissionType
ObjectProperties.Label: Transmission Type
ObjectProperties.Description: The transmission type (eg: Automatic, CVT, Manual).

ObjectProperties.Name: NumberOfGears

ObjectProperties.Description: The number of forward gears.

ObjectProperties.Name: DriveType

ObjectProperties.Name: DrivingAxle

ObjectProperties.Name: EuroNcap
ObjectProperties.Label: Euro Ncap
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing Vehicle Euro NCAP data.

ObjectProperties.Name: NcapStarRating
ObjectProperties.Label: NCAP Star Rating
ObjectProperties.Description: NCAP (The European New Car Assessment Programme) The safety rating as assigned by NCAP.

ObjectProperties.Name: NcapChildPercent
ObjectProperties.Label: NCAP Child Percent
ObjectProperties.Description: The NCAP percentage - rated level of protection for a child occupant, in the event of an impact.

ObjectProperties.Name: NcapAdultPercent
ObjectProperties.Label: NCAP Adult Percent
ObjectProperties.Description: The NCAP percentage - rated level of protection for a adult occupant, in the event of an impact.

ObjectProperties.Name: NcapPedestrianPercent
ObjectProperties.Label: NCAP Pedestrian Percent
ObjectProperties.Description: The NCAP percentage - rated level of protection for a pedestrian, in the event of an impact.

ObjectProperties.Name: NcapSafetyAssistPercent

ObjectProperties.Name: EuroStatus
ObjectProperties.Label: Euro Status

ObjectProperties.Name: ManufacturerCo2
ObjectProperties.Label: Manufacturer CO2
ObjectProperties.Description: The manufacturer's claimed level of CO2 emissions.

ObjectProperties.Name: SoundLevels
ObjectProperties.Label: Sound Levels Section
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing Sound Levels Data.

ObjectProperties.Name: StationaryDb
ObjectProperties.Label: Stationary
ObjectProperties.Description: Sound level, in decibels, measured whilst vehicle is stationary.

ObjectProperties.Name: EngineSpeedRpm
ObjectProperties.Label: Engine Speed
ObjectProperties.Description: Engine speed at which sound measurements are taken.

ObjectProperties.Name: DriveByDb
ObjectProperties.Label: Drive By Db
ObjectProperties.Description: Sound level, in decibels, measured for the drive by test.

ObjectProperties.Name: DragCoefficient
ObjectProperties.Label: Drag Coefficient
ObjectProperties.Description: A dimensionless quantity that is used to quantify the drag or resistance of an object in a fluid environment. Used for aerodynamic drag calculation in the case of a road vehicle.

ObjectProperties.Name: Torque
ObjectProperties.Label: Torque
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing torque data.

ObjectProperties.Name: Nm
ObjectProperties.Label: Nm
ObjectProperties.Description: Maximum torque expressed in Nm (Newton Metre).

ObjectProperties.Name: LbFt
ObjectProperties.Label: LbFt
ObjectProperties.Description: Maximum torque expressed in LbFt (Pound Foot).

ObjectProperties.Name: Rpm
ObjectProperties.Label: RPM
ObjectProperties.Description: Engine RPM where peak torque is achieved.

ObjectProperties.Name: Power
ObjectProperties.Label: Power
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing power data.

ObjectProperties.Name: Bhp
ObjectProperties.Label: BHP
ObjectProperties.Description: Maximum power expressed in BHP (Brake Horse Power).

ObjectProperties.Name: Ps
ObjectProperties.Label: PS
ObjectProperties.Description: Maximum power expressed in PS (PferdStarke is the metric measure of horsepower. It is the equivalent of 98.6% of one HP).

ObjectProperties.Name: Kw
ObjectProperties.Label: kW
ObjectProperties.Description: Maximum power expressed in kW (Kilowatts).

ObjectProperties.Name: Rpm
ObjectProperties.Label: RPM
ObjectProperties.Description: Engine RPM where peak power is achieved.

ObjectProperties.Name: Statistics
ObjectProperties.Label: Statistics
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing statistics data.

ObjectProperties.Name: ZeroToSixtyMph

ObjectProperties.Name: ZeroToOneHundredKph

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxSpeedKph

ObjectProperties.Description: The manufacturer's claimed top speed expressed in kilometers per hour.

ObjectProperties.Name: MaxSpeedMph

ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not the vehicle successfully passed this test.

ObjectProperties.Name: ExpiryDate

ObjectProperties.Name: OdometerReading

ObjectProperties.Name: OdometerUnit
ObjectProperties.Label: Odometer Unit
ObjectProperties.Description: Odometer unit (eg: Miles, Kilometers).

ObjectProperties.Name: OdometerResultType
ObjectProperties.Label: Odometer Result Type
ObjectProperties.Description: Odometer result type (eg: READ, UN-READABLE).

ObjectProperties.Name: TestNumber
ObjectProperties.Label: Test Number
ObjectProperties.Description: MOT test number/reference.

ObjectProperties.Name: DaysSinceLastTest
ObjectProperties.Label: Days Since Last Test
ObjectProperties.Description: Number of days since the last MOT test.

ObjectProperties.Name: DaysSinceLastPass
ObjectProperties.Label: Days Since Last Pass
ObjectProperties.Description: Number of days since the last successfully passed MOT test.

ObjectProperties.Name: DaysOutOfMot
ObjectProperties.Label: Days Out Of Mot
ObjectProperties.Description: Number of days outside of MOT test validity period.

ObjectProperties.Name: IsRetest
ObjectProperties.Label: Is Retest
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not this was an MOT re-test (as in a re-test after a previously failed test).

ObjectProperties.Name: ExtensionInformation
ObjectProperties.Label: Extension Information
ObjectProperties.Description: Object containing MOT test extension information details.

ObjectProperties.Name: HasExtensionPeriod
ObjectProperties.Label: Has Extension
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not an extension period has been assigned for this test.

ObjectProperties.Name: ExtensionPeriodReason
ObjectProperties.Label: Reason

ObjectProperties.Name: ExtensionPeriodAdditionalDays
ObjectProperties.Label: Additional Days
ObjectProperties.Description: Number of additional days before the MOT validity period expires.

ObjectProperties.Name: ExtensionPeriodOriginalDueDate
ObjectProperties.Label: Original Due Date

ObjectProperties.Name: PrivateClean

ObjectProperties.Name: PrivateAverage
ObjectProperties.Label: Private Average
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle in Average condition. Estimated value a consumer/non trade user could potentially sell the vehicle for.

ObjectProperties.Name: PartExchange
ObjectProperties.Label: Part Exchange
ObjectProperties.Description: Estimated value when used as a part exchange against another vehicle at a Franchise or Trade dealer.

ObjectProperties.Name: Auction
ObjectProperties.Label: Auction

ObjectProperties.Name: TradeAverage
ObjectProperties.Label: Trade Average
ObjectProperties.Description: Estimated value a Trade dealer could potentially sell the vehicle for - in Average condition.

ObjectProperties.Name: TradePoor
ObjectProperties.Label: Trade Poor
ObjectProperties.Description: Estimated value a Trade dealer could potentially sell the vehicle for - in Poor condition.

ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge details. Object contains information regarding the First Year, Premium Vehicle and Standard vehicle road taxes.

ObjectProperties.Name: FirstYear
ObjectProperties.Label: First Year
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for the first year. Object contains 6 & 12 month values.

ObjectProperties.Name: SixMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Six Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 6 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: TwelveMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Twelve Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 12 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: PremiumVehicle
ObjectProperties.Label: Premium Vehicle
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle Road Tax charge for Premium rated vehicles OTR above Â£40,000. Object contains 6 & 12 month values.

ObjectProperties.Name: SixMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Six Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 6 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: TwelveMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Twelve Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 12 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: Standard
ObjectProperties.Label: Standard
ObjectProperties.Description: Standard vehicle road tax. Object contains 6 & 12 month values.

ObjectProperties.Name: SixMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Six Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 6 months.

ObjectProperties.Name: TwelveMonths
ObjectProperties.Label: Twelve Months
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle road tax charge for 12 months.

VehicleTaxDetails.Name: StatusMessage
VehicleTaxDetails.Label: Status Message
VehicleTaxDetails.Description: API Response Status Message. Human description describing the API response.

SpecAndOptionsDetails.Name: Model
SpecAndOptionsDetails.Label: Model
SpecAndOptionsDetails.Description: Vehicle model (eg: C-Max Style TDCi, Focus LX).

ObjectProperties.Name: Type
ObjectProperties.Label: Type
ObjectProperties.Description: Type of equipment (eg: Item, Package).

ObjectProperties.Name: Fitment
ObjectProperties.Label: Fitment
ObjectProperties.Description: Manufacturers fitment type (eg: Standard, Option).

ObjectProperties.Name: Category
ObjectProperties.Label: Category
ObjectProperties.Description: Category this item/package relates to (eg: Comfort/Interior & Exterior, Audio/Communication/Instruments).

ObjectProperties.Name: Name
ObjectProperties.Label: Name
ObjectProperties.Description: Name of the equipment item/package.

ObjectProperties.Name: Description
ObjectProperties.Label: Description
ObjectProperties.Description: Short description for this item/package.

ObjectProperties.Name: Price
ObjectProperties.Label: Price
ObjectProperties.Description: Price of this option.

ObjectProperties.Name: PackageContentList
ObjectProperties.Label: Package Content List
ObjectProperties.Description: List of Package Contents (Equipment items within the Package).

ObjectProperties.Name: Description
ObjectProperties.Label: Description
ObjectProperties.Description: Short description for this item within the package.

SpecAndOptionsDetails.Name: StatusMessage
SpecAndOptionsDetails.Label: Status Message
SpecAndOptionsDetails.Description: API Response Status Message. Human description describing the API response.

ObjectProperties.Name: ViewAngle
ObjectProperties.Label: View Angle
ObjectProperties.Description: The angle of the vehicle in the image

ObjectProperties.Name: ImageUrl
ObjectProperties.Label: Image URL
ObjectProperties.Description: URL to download this vehicle image.

ObjectProperties.Name: Colour
ObjectProperties.Label: Colour
ObjectProperties.Description: A Hex (Hexadecimal) colour reference for this vehicle (eg: #002400).

ObjectProperties.Name: Description
ObjectProperties.Label: Description
ObjectProperties.Description: Vehicle image colour description (eg: Light Green, White).

ObjectProperties.Name: ExpiryDate
ObjectProperties.Label: Expiry Date
ObjectProperties.Description: Expiry date and time for this image. After this time, the URL will not return a vehicle image.

VehicleImageDetails.Name: StatusMessage
VehicleImageDetails.Label: Status Message
VehicleImageDetails.Description: API Response Status Message. Human description describing the API response.

ObjectProperties.Name: Mileage
ObjectProperties.Label: Mileage
ObjectProperties.Description: Recorded mileage

ObjectProperties.Name: DateRecorded
ObjectProperties.Label: Date Recorded
ObjectProperties.Description: Date the mileage was recorded

ObjectProperties.Name: InSequence
ObjectProperties.Label: In Sequence
ObjectProperties.Description: Indicates whether or not this mileage is in ascending numerical sequence compared to the previous reading.

ObjectProperties.Name: DataSource
ObjectProperties.Label: Data Source
ObjectProperties.Description: Description of where this mileage data was obtained (eg: MOT).

MileageCheckDetails.Name: MileageAnomalyDetected
MileageCheckDetails.Label: Mileage Anomaly Detected
MileageCheckDetails.Description: Indicates whether or not a mileage anomaly was detected (eg: a later mileage figure was lower than a previous figure).

MileageCheckDetails.Name: CalculatedAverageAnnualMileage
MileageCheckDetails.Label: Calculated Average Annual Mileage
MileageCheckDetails.Description: The mileage readings averaged over the number of years old the vehicle is

MileageCheckDetails.Name: AverageMileageForAge
MileageCheckDetails.Label: Average Mileage For Age
MileageCheckDetails.Description: Years old multiplied by 12,000 for cars, 15,000 for LCVs and 4,000 for motorcycles

MileageCheckDetails.Name: StatusMessage
MileageCheckDetails.Label: Status Message
MileageCheckDetails.Description: API Response Status Message. Human description describing the API response.
